name: luminesce
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a substance) to produce light without being heated: Solids that luminesce are called phosphors.
More examplesFewer examplesIs it a water-based ink source? Does it luminesce?Quartz typically luminesces only weakly.Liquid crystals undergo structural transformations that make them luminesce.
